cui_name: High Grade B-Cell Lymphoma, Not Otherwise Specified
reasoning: High-grade B-cell lymphomas comprise ~3-5% of NHL cases. Global NHL incidence ~7-8 per 100k; high-grade B-cell estimate ~2.5 per 100k. Based on epidemiological studies, but specific subtype definition varies; confidence moderate due to classification uncertainty.
source: WHO classification of Tumours of Haematopoietic and Lymphoid Tissues; epidemiological surveys
